refnamediv.refpurpose: Return info about a group by group id

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns an array of information about a group and &false; on failure. If gid isn't a number then &null; is returned and an E_WARNING level error is generated.

example.title: Example use of posix_getgrgid
example.programlisting:
<?php

$groupid   = posix_getegid();
$groupinfo = posix_getgrgid($groupid);

print_r($groupinfo);

/* An example output:

Array
(
    [name]    => toons
    [passwd]  => x
    [members] => Array 
        ( 
            [0] => tom
            [1] => jerry
        )
    [gid]     => 42
)

*/
?>

note.para: As of PHP 4.2.0, members is returned as an array of member usernames in the group. Before this time it was simply an integer (the number of members in the group) and the member names were returned with numerical indices.

refsect1.para: See also posix_getegid, filegroup, stat, and safe_mode_gid.
